subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Rafal Majka, a Polish climbing specialist, won Stage 14 of the Tour de France, and Vincenzo Nibali finished in second to extend his overall lead.
snippet: Rafal Majka, a Polish climbing specialist, won Stage 14 of the Tour de France, and Vincenzo Nibali finished in second to extend his overall lead.
